name: Really Zoomed-in Dungeon
description:
Explore the depths of a randomly-generating evil-creature infested dungeon!  Fight through the enemy hordes, defeat bosses, and collect items in this roguelike dungeon crawler!  Includes 3 unique classes, an inventory system and loads of fun!  Made in ~2 weeks for LOWREZJAM 2020!

Music and SFX: Andrebisaber (itch) (instagram) (facebook)

Color palette used: BPRD-16
